attributes.action: Stop giving accommodation, financial support & healthcare to illegal immigrants.
attributes.additional_details: Stop giving accommodation, financial support & healthcare to illegal immigrants.
attributes.background: We want the Government to stop providing accommodation, financial support and healthcare to people who have entered the UK illegally.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Stop financial and other support for asylum seekers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705383
